framelessWindow.name: Custom titlebar
framelessWindow.description: Disable to use the native titlebar.

minimizeToTray.name: Minimize to tray
minimizeToTray.description: When disabled, GoofCord will close like any other window when closed, otherwise, it'll sit back and relax in your system tray for later.

startMinimized.name: Start minimized
startMinimized.description: GoofCord starts in the background and remains out of your way.

dynamicIcon.name: Dynamic icon
dynamicIcon.description: Following Discord's behavior on Windows, this shows unread messages/pings count on GoofCord's icon instead of its tray. Overwrites the custom icon.

customIconPath.name: Custom Icon Path
customIconPath.description:
Leave empty for the default icon. The path should conform to your OS's format.
A Windows example: "D:/Downloads/icon.png". A Linux and macOS example: "~/Downloads/icon.png".

autoscroll.name: Auto-scroll
autoscroll.description: Enables the ability to auto-scroll with a middle mouse button click. Enable this only if that is not the default behavior already.

transparency.name: Transparency
transparency.description: Makes the window transparent so it's possible to use translucent themes.

modName.name: Client mod
modName.description: What client mod to use. Vencord is heavily recommended because much of GoofCord's functionality depends on it.

customCssBundle.name: Custom CSS bundle
customCssBundle.description: A raw link to the JS bundle and CSS bundle of a client mod you want to use. Placeholder css: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Milkshiift/empty/main/empty.txt"

blocklist.name: Blocklist
blocklist.description: A list of URLs to block. Each entry must be separated by a comma.

autoUpdateDefaultScripts.name: Auto-update default scripts
autoUpdateDefaultScripts.description: Enables auto-update for the default GoofCord scripts.

encryptionPasswords.name: Encryption passwords
encryptionPasswords.description: Securely stored, encrypted list of your passwords. A backup in a warm, safe place is recommended. Separate entries with commas.

encryptionCover.name: Encryption cover
encryptionCover.description: A message that a user without the password will see. Minimum two words or empty.

encryptionMark.name: Encryption Mark
encryptionMark.description: A string that will be prepended to each decrypted message so it's easier to know what messages are encrypted.

arrpc.name: Activity display
arrpc.description: Enables the use of an open source reimplementation of Discord's rich presence called arRPC.

launchWithOsBoot.name: Launch GoofCord on startup
launchWithOsBoot.description: When enabled starts GoofCord on OS boot automatically.

spellcheck.name: Spellcheck
spellcheck.description: Whether to enable spellcheck for input fields or not.

updateNotification.name: Update notification
updateNotification.description: If enabled, when a new version releases, a notification will pop up telling you that an update is available. Pings github.com

disableAutogain.name: Disable auto-gain
disableAutogain.description: Disable microphone auto-gain. It can be useful when your mic is quieter than it should be.

prfmMode.name: Performance mode
prfmMode.description: Performance mode is an experimental feature that may either increase responsiveness and performance of GoofCord orâ€¦ decrease it. Try every option and see which fits you the best.

discordUrl.name: Discord URL
discordUrl.description: URL that GoofCord will load on launch. Variations: https://canary.discord.com/app, https://ptb.discord.com/app or https://discord.com/app
